PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-06292016-06-21TC,  APA,  ,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Atlantic Pilotage Tariff Regulations â€” Newfoundland and Labrador Non-Compulsory Areas
PrecisRegulations Amending the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE TARIFF REGULATIONS - NEWFOUNDLAND AND LABRADOR NON-COMPULSORY AREAS in order to increase pilotage charges in certain non-compulsory areas to: (1) maintain the ability of the Authority to meet its mandate to operate, in the interest of safety, an efficient pilotage service within the Atlantic region; (2) encourage pilots to be licensed for non-compulsory assignments and provide the services when requested by industry; and (3) be mindful of the economic realities of the region by ensuring that the tariff increases are within the ability of the shipping industry to absorb while allowing the ports to remain competitive.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0202 Publication Date: 2016-07-13
AttachmentsAttachment
